Раньше игра была шикарна даже не смотря на баги. Раньше - это 2017-2018 года. Сейчас же она превратилась в помойку, напичканную багами, вылетами на экран загрузки и прочей хернёй которую никогда не исправят! потому что им пофиг на игроков. Мой вердикт не однозначен, так как если вы живете не в странах СНГ где как минимум не наблюдаются проблемы с вылетами из за сети, игру еще как то можно рекомендовать! Но увы, я попал в категорию у которых эта проблема наблюдается, и частота ее настолько велика, что играть как то не хочется - совсем...

Не удалось настроить чувствительность обзора мышью. На следующем матче сбрасывается на дефолт. После четырех попыток бросил играть.

Что такое добода?

Ассиметричный хоррор, который полностью оправдывает себя.
Это первые десять часов игра может держать в напряжении, даже немного стрёмно за сурва, но потом понимаешь что на самом деле стрёмно играть за маньяка.
Это сгоревшая жопа за мана, это визг сурвов, проигравших из за своих повторяющихся ошибок.
Это когда ты без метовых перков делаешь -4, но в постигровом чате все равно ты нуб) Когда не делаешь -4, тем более. 
Это вечно дополняющийся и меняющийся руллбук сурвомейнов, и взаимоисключающие параграфы не важны, не надо ничего доказывать, оправдывать - виновен по всем пунктам.
Это иная карма.
Отпускаешь сурвов в люк? За сурва жди в свою сторону мори в 4 случаях из 10.
Берёшь розовое мори, ноед, гидеон? В постигровом чате рря увидишь, но, на самом деле, всем поxyi.
Это свф целиком из смурф аккаунтов или просто 2к часов челиков, которые до сих пор доказывают маньяку, рандомам и даже твоей кошке, %username%, что они боги игры)
Это pretty good job so far с целой историей багов/нерфов в 4 года. 
Farewell, телепорт к паллеткам, полёт с помощью dead hard'a, нюрса с 3+ блинками, ножик без таймера, абузный камень у гаража, здоровый Деревенщина, орущая как витас Кейт, etc.

Пофиксите баланс выживших, так как на хай лэвеле за убийцу невозможно играть, хоть какой бы у тебя скилл не был.
А и наитупейший нерф ранга убийцы, вам кажется за него было легче до этого играть? Разрабы вы ошибаетесь, катаните на 3-4 ранге, я посмотрю на вас.

This review is coming from the view of a casual player who doesn't have the time to practice to become god tier.
This game has brought me a lot of funny moments and good times with my friends, but let's be honest, the game is only good if you are with friends. When you're alone, this game literally only manages to sour your mood. This game feels as if it could only POSSIBLY be enjoyed by people who are extremely good at it. There is no saving grace for new players or players who don't ever get good (me). This game is alright as a senseless party game for sure. Don't fall into the trap of thinking this is a horror game. 
Honestly, this game is a disgrace to the entire horror genre, the developers pour tons of money into acquiring the licenses to major horror names, then literally make those great killers look like idiots. The survivors don't do anything even close to what a human being would even THINK about doing if they were in this situation, and the killers are so easy to make look like they were just born a few hours ago. 
I do appreciate the addition of Ash Williams to the game, he is a long loved character of mine and my favorite horror movie protagonist. He makes a great appearance here and his entry story is canonicly sound. Having him voice acted was a plus. He fits well in this game and he is one of its only saving graces.
This game has ruined Michael Myers, Freddy Krueger, Leatherface and soon, they're going to make Ghostface look like an idiot too. The canon of this game's story is also complete garbage. If these killers even were in this situation, they wouldn't dream of appeasing some entity, especially Myers. Myers is a legit psycho, there's NO reason he would kill for anyone but himself. 
This game's community is also extremely toxic. The survivor mains think they deserve to escape because they complain and report anyone who plays in a way they don't like. And the killer mains tryhard like crazy against entry level survivors cause they are conditioned to think everyone is a jerk. There's no one in this game's community that wants to actually uplift the players of the other team to practice and become better, they literally just want the players from the other team to let them win. 
I feel like this game's developers had a great idea when they made this game, but it was just executed so poorly. This is one of my favorite and least favorite games at the same time. Honestly, I just recommend you play Call of Duty, it will be much less anger inducing than this black hole of trash. Find a more relaxing game to play, and save yourself a trip to the hospital due to having an aneurysm.
3.0.0 update....
I'm at a loss for words, absolute disgrace....
I was excited for Ghostface to come to the game. He's another one of my slasher movie favorites and I had decent expectations, although I kept my expectations low considering how good this game is.... Although what I got was far under what I hoped for. This killer is terrible, literally SOOO easy to loop.... FOR HOURS. The developers can tick another great movie that they want to crap on off their list. This is actually disgusting, I hope they are going to buff him to high hell, or else I am quitting this game for good. I wish there was a way to double dislike this game, and I wish there was a better horror slasher game to move onto(That isn't in a legal battle for rights). As a fan of horror and video games, this game has done every thing it can to push me away from the horror genre as a whole. Terrible....
To end on a good note.... The updates to Kate and Feng's long hair cosmetics are lovely. As a person who plays these two characters the most, I can appreciate that they were updated, they look great.
3.0.1 update....
They just can't get it right. I've actually lost interest in this game, and I'm tired of wasting my time with it. I've finally uninstalled this game for the last time, and I may never come back. Freddy was supposed to be getting a buff this update, and he KIND OF did. Freddy himself is better, but the environment has been changed to benefit the survivors immensely. About a hundred pallets have been added to each map and the loops are even loopier than before. There's no point to playing survivor because it's too easy and there's no point to playing killer because the survivors will have only used about half the pallets on the map by the time all five gens have been completed. This game seems as though it will never be fixed. The developers seem to care much more about pushing content than actually making the game playable. I wish I could give this two thumbs down. To end on a positive note, like I always try to, I'm glad I decided to retire from this game.
3.2.0
So.... well played Behavior, you roped me back in with my favorite T.V. show. So they finally brought Stranger Things to Dead by Daylight. They brought my favorite character, Steve to the game, so there was no way I could refuse coming back to the game. 
The update, sadly, is terrible. The servers are being crashed hard by the MASSIVE influx of players that understandably got roped to their doom by the promise of your favorite Stranger Things characters.
There are cosmetic changes that bring the quality of the graphics down. It's honestly hard to swallow that the developers update the game by making its quality worse. Like, wow, you're going the wrong way Behavior. Now is it fun to play as Steve from Stranger Things? Yes. Is it fun to play Dead by Daylight? You better believe it's not. This game must be barely managing to stay afloat. Honestly, I believe the only thing keeping this game alive is the constant flow of Licensed content. We got Ash from Evil Dead, then we got Ghostface, and now we got Stranger Things. Like, can you think of any original content? If you got writer's block I can help you with that....
So to end on a good note, I'll address the obvious great thing about the update. STRANGER THINGS!!! Who doesn't like that?

This game is fun to stream and I hope you keep adding more, best horror game 2017!

Последняя обнова убила игру, удаляю это говно, так как за сурвов с друзьями играть невозможно. Куча токсичных педиков на маньяках просто задолбали, не покупайте игру, не тратьте время. Просто обматеритесь, потратите деньги, нервы и время. Разрабы насрали на игру и им пофигу на игру. Такое ощущение что вдохновение они черпают со школофорумов и слушаю ноющих оленей, которые играют на Хилли Билли.

鬼ごっこゲームです！　オススメです！

４：１の生存者VS殺人鬼のゲームで、生存者は条件を満たして逃げれば勝ち、殺人鬼はより多くの生存者を倒せば勝ち

ゲームルールも１つで単純なゲームですが、両プレイヤー様々なスキルアイテム、装備アイテム、特殊効果アイテム等を駆使してしのぎを削りあいます。

プレイヤースキルも上達の楽しみがあり、生存者は上手くなればなるほど殺人鬼から追いかけられても、捕まりづらくなり
逆に殺人鬼も、早く生存者を捕まえ、全滅できるかといったプロセスが上手くなります。

また、様々な映画、ゲームの殺人鬼、キャラクターでプレイできるのも魅力の一つです　フレディ、マイケルマイヤーズ、レザーフェイス、ＳＡＷアマンダ、ゴーストフェイス、デモゴルゴン　エクセキューショナー

Moraleja: " hace años pagas dlcs con otro nombre"

Better than Friday the 13th but still wouldn't recommend playing this game for more than a few hundred hours at most, or maybe occasionally coming back once in a while. Playing it is akin to having an abusive girlfriend who's too hot to break up with. It's fun in the short term but can be draining and somewhat frustrating in the long term (Especially the grind, community, and balance issues).  So I guess I can't say it's a bad game quality-wise, rather I'd say it's a game that wasn't meant to last this long, or get nearly as popular as it is. My review of this game is constantly changing and my last edit was admittedly quite cynical so I decided I'd cut the game some slack and say it can be fun at times, just that said fun is short-lived, and for the most part not worth enduring the negatives. In all honesty, my thoughts about this game are constantly changing and I'm not sure what my final opinion of this game is. But what I will say is that at the moment I don't think this is a game worth buying, especially for the amount of money you'll likely be spending on in-game purchases, and the amount of frustration you'll go through while playing.
